ACCOUNT_DISABLED.en: This user account has been disabled.

INVALID_EMAIL_PASSWORD.en: You have entered an invalid email or password.

USER_EXISTS.en: A user exists with same Username or Email Address.

UNKNOWN_ERROR.en: An unknown error has occurred! Please try again.

PASSWORD_NOT_MATCHED.en: New Password and Confirm Password donn't match!

PASSWORD_CHANGE_ERROR.en: An error occurred on password change!

INVALID_OLD_PASSWORD.en: The Old password you have entered is wrong!

STATUS_UPDATE_ERROR.en: An error has occurred while updating status!

PROFILE_UPDATE_ERROR.en: An error occurred on profile update.

OTP_SENT.en: OTP has been sent to your email ID.

EMAIL_UPDATE_ERROR.en: An error has occurred on email update!

INVALID_MEASUREMENT.en: Please enter a valid measurement unit.

FIRST_NAME_LENGTH.en: First name can't be less than three words!

LAST_NAME_LENGTH.en: Last name can't be less than three words!

PASSWORD_LENGTH.en: Password must be at least eight characters long!
